text: Wolves in Wolves' Clothing is the tenth studio album by American punk rock band, NOFX. Wolves in Wolves' Clothing was released on April 18, 2006. The producers of the album were Bill Stevenson, Jason Livermore and Fat Mike. The first 1062 vinyl copies of Wolves in Wolves' Clothing were pressed yellow/green vinyl. ==Songs== Category:2006 albums Category:NOFX albums Category:Punk albums
title: Wolves in Wolves' Clothing
